channel.title: Uefi on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Uefi on Arrans github.io

item.title: armbian/build
item.description: The official build framework for the Armbian Linux distribution. This repository contains the complete toolchain and scripts required to compile custom OS images from source, including kernel configuration, U-Boot handling, and board-specific tweaks for various ARM and ARM64 single-board computers.

item.title: limine-bootloader/limine
item.description: Modern, advanced, portable, multiprotocol bootloader and boot manager. (Official mirror of https://codeberg.org/Limine/Limine)
